Others: India hammered Bangladesh by 280 runs in the Chennai Test and then won in Kanpur by seven wickets, despite two days getting washed out by rain, to sweep the series 2-0.
Mayank Yadav sent the speed gun into an overdrive with a 149.8 kmph delivery in his debut international appearance.
India's bowling strength, particularly the debut of Mayank Yadav, was highlighted by former Pakistan batsman Basit Ali.
